name: Energy Clicker (BoneManSeth)
description:
Made for the Godot Wild Jam for the "Solarpunk" theme

wild cards used: spoopy and behold.

This is a very basic clicker game that's entirely based around energy production.

the objective of the game is simple, produce 10 milion energy points to successfully power the city.

this is my first "complete" project so it's kinda bad, so if there's jank, that's why.

Source Code: soon

android version: soon
